meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Sanders Sharon Golembeski Cynthia Kocanovic Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4011.

td.p: Steve Sanders, a graduate student from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
Sharon Golembeski, a training manager from Wethersfield, Connecticut
Cynthia Kocanovic, a fundraiser from Toronto, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,300)

tr.td: AMERICANA
THEIR TOP 40 ALBUMS
HIPPOPOURRI
WE ALL SCREAM FOR ICE CREAM
LIFE ON THE FARM
4-SYLLABLE WORDS

Michael Bloomberg
